tool_description: API for querying the DTCC Swaps Data Repository (SDR) for Forex (FX), Equities, Rates, Credit and Commodities
name: Slither
title: Slither

api_list.name: Credit Today
api_list.description: Retrieve all Credit submissions Executed Today (UTC)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://slither.p.rapidapi.com/credit/today"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "slither.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
